renderingProperty.name: Light detail
renderingProperty.description: Default: seamark name (light character.group.period), select additional information on sectors 1 to 3 or sector 1,2,3,4,5 light character

renderingProperty.name: Seabed detail
renderingProperty.description: Additional text information on seabed surface_qualification, combined surface types, category and taxon of weed or seagrass

renderingProperty.name: Current GPX color
renderingProperty.description: Color of the currently recording track

renderingProperty.name: Current GPX width
renderingProperty.description: Width of the currently recording track

renderingProperty.name: Hide polygons
renderingProperty.description: Make all areal land features on map transparent
